item.text: Now the Feast of Unleavened Bread, which is called the Passover, was approaching.
The chief priests and the experts in the law were trying to find some way to execute Jesus, for they were afraid of the people.
Then Satan entered Judas, the one called Iscariot, who was one of the twelve.

He <st data-num="565">went away</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4814" class="">discussed</st> with the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4755" class="">officers of the temple guard</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he might<n id="2" /> betray Jesus,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3860" class="">handing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="4" />

They<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="5463" class="">delighted</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4934" class="">arranged</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="694" class="">money</st>.<n id="3" />
So Judas agreed and began looking for an opportunity to betray Jesus when no crowd was present.
Then the day for the feast of Unleavened Bread came, on which the Passover lamb had to be sacrificed.

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="3004">saying</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st> and <st data-num="2090" class="">prepare</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st>.”<n id="3" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4226">Where</st> do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> us to <st data-num="2090" class="">prepare</st><n id="2" /> it?”

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Listen</st>,<n id="1" /> when <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="941" class="">carrying</st> a <st data-num="2765" class="">jar</st> of <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="4876" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="190" class="">Follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1531" class="">enters</st>,

<st data-num="2548">Then he</st> will <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">large</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">furnished</st> <st data-num="508">room upstairs</st>. <st data-num="2090">Make preparations</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>.”

Now when the hour came, Jesus took his place at the table and the apostles joined him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I have <st data-num="1939" class="">earnestly</st> <st data-num="1937" class="">desired</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> on I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1081" class="">fruit</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="288" class="">vine</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, and after <st data-num="2168">giving thanks</st> he <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> it <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st><n id="2" /> which is <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="364" class="">remembrance</st> of <st data-num="1699" class="">me</st>.”
And in the same way he took the cup after they had eaten, saying, “This cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood.
“But look, the hand of the one who betrays me is with me on the table.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> is to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="2596">just as</st> it has been <st data-num="3724" class="">determined</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4133" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3759" class="">woe</st> to <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he is <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2961" class="">lord</st> it <st data-num="2961">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="1850">in authority over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> are <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> ‘<st data-num="2110">benefactors</st>.’<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3756" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">you;</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">instead</st> the one who is <st data-num="3173">greatest</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="3501" class="">youngest</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2233" class="">leader</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the one who <st data-num="1247" class="">serves</st>.<n id="3" />

“You are the ones who have remained with me in my trials.

<st data-num="2504">Thus<n id="1" /> I</st> <st data-num="1303" class="">grant</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1303" class="">granted</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,

“Simon, Simon, pay attention! Satan has demanded to have you all, to sift you like wheat,

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Peter<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>!”<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="235">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, the one who<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> a <st data-num="905">money bag</st> must <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3668" class="">likewise</st> a <st data-num="4082">traveler’s bag</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st> must <st data-num="4453" class="">sell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> one.

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="450">got up</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st>, he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> and <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2837" class="">sleeping</st>, exhausted<n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">grief</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2455">Judas</st>, would you <st data-num="3860" class="">betray</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> with a <st data-num="5370" class="">kiss</st>?”<n id="1" />

Then they arrested Jesus, led him away, and brought him into the high priest’s house. But Peter was following at a distance.

When they had <st data-num="681" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3319" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="833" class="">courtyard</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4776">sat down together</st>, <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2521">sat down</st> <st data-num="3319" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> a <st data-num="3814">slave girl</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">seeing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> as he <st data-num="2521" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">firelight</st>, <st data-num="816">stared at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Peter<n id="1" /> <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> it: “<st data-num="1135">Woman</st>,<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”
